coffee_type.description: Black coffee is as simple as it gets with ground coffee beans steeped in hot water, served warm.
Black coffee is as simple as it gets with ground coffee beans steeped in hot water, served warm.
Latte is comprised of a shot of espresso and steamed milk with just a touch of foam. It can be ordered plain or with a flavor shot of anything from vanilla to pumpkin spice.
Latte is comprised of a shot of espresso and steamed milk with just a touch of foam. It can be ordered plain or with a flavor shot of anything from vanilla to pumpkin spice.
Latte made with more foam than steamed milk, often with a sprinkle of cocoa powder or cinnamon on top
Latte made with more foam than steamed milk, often with a sprinkle of cocoa powder or cinnamon on top
Americano consists of an espresso shot diluted in hot water.
Americano consists of an espresso shot diluted in hot water.
An espresso shot can be served solo or used as the foundation of most coffee drinks, like lattes and macchiatos.
An espresso shot can be served solo or used as the foundation of most coffee drinks, like lattes and macchiatos.
A double shot of espresso
A double shot of espresso
A cortado is the perfect balance of espresso and warm steamed milk. The milk is used to cut back on the espresso’s acidity.
A cortado is the perfect balance of espresso and warm steamed milk. The milk is used to cut back on the espresso’s acidity.
A full cup of hot coffee with an espresso shot mixed in
A full cup of hot coffee with an espresso shot mixed in
A long-pull espresso. The longer the pull, the more caffeine there is
A long-pull espresso. The longer the pull, the more caffeine there is
An espresso-based drink that has a small amount of foam on top
An espresso-based drink that has a small amount of foam on top
A chocolate espresso drink with steamed milk and foam.
A chocolate espresso drink with steamed milk and foam.
An espresso shot. It uses less hot water which creates a sweeter flavor compared to the bitter taste of a traditional shot of espresso
A cappuccino without the foam or chocolate sprinkle.
A cappuccino without the foam or chocolate sprinkle.
Served with a scoop of ice cream and a shot of espresso, or two
A splash of warm milk to your coffee

Consists of black coffee, whiskey and sugar, topped with whipped cream.
Consists of black coffee, whiskey and sugar, topped with whipped cream.
Coffee with ice, typically served with a dash of milk, cream or sweetener
Cold brew coffees are made by steeping coffee beans from anywhere between 6-36 hours, depending on how strong you would like your cold brew.
A blended iced coffee drink that’s topped with whipped cream and syrup
A cold brew + nitrogen bubbles = a cold brew coffee with a frothy, Guinness-like consistency
